mapper.update:
update JO_ORDER
AG_ID = #{agId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AG_NAME = #{agName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_ID = #{busId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PALTFORM_NUM = #{paltformNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_FIRST_KEY_NUM = #{joFirstKeyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_SECOND_KEY_NUM = #{joSecondKeyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY_LEVEL = #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAUNCH_TIME = #{launchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAUNCH_PERSON_ID = #{launchPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAUNCH_PERSON_NAME = #{launchPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAUNCH_PERSON_EMAIL = #{launchPersonEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAUNCH_BRANCH_ID = #{launchBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAUNCH_BRANCH_NAME = #{launchBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCEPT_GROUP_CODE = #{acceptGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCEPT_GROUP = #{acceptGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCEPT_NOW_GROUP = #{acceptNowGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_TIME_START = #{dealTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEAL_TIME_END = #{dealTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEAL_TIME_LENGTH = #{dealTimeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JO_PROGRESS = #{joProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_TITLE = #{joTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_CONTENT = #{joContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_ASSESS_LEVEL = #{joAssessLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JO_ASSESSOR_NAME = #{joAssessorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_ASSESSOR_TYPE = #{joAssessorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_ASSESSOR_ID = #{joAssessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_ASSESS_CONTENT = #{joAssessContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_ASSESS_TIME = #{joAssessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update JO_ORDER set AG_ID = #{agId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AG_NAME = #{agName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_ID = #{busId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PALTFORM_NUM = #{paltformNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_FIRST_KEY_NUM = #{joFirstKeyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_SECOND_KEY_NUM = #{joSecondKeyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY_LEVEL = #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAUNCH_TIME = #{launchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAUNCH_PERSON_ID = #{launchPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAUNCH_PERSON_NAME = #{launchPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAUNCH_PERSON_EMAIL = #{launchPersonEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAUNCH_BRANCH_ID = #{launchBranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAUNCH_BRANCH_NAME = #{launchBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPT_GROUP_CODE = #{acceptGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPT_GROUP = #{acceptGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPT_NOW_GROUP = #{acceptNowGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_TIME_START = #{dealTimeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_TIME_END = #{dealTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_TIME_LENGTH = #{dealTimeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JO_PROGRESS = #{joProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_TITLE = #{joTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_CONTENT = #{joContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_ASSESS_LEVEL = #{joAssessLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JO_ASSESSOR_NAME = #{joAssessorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_ASSESSOR_TYPE = #{joAssessorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_ASSESSOR_ID = #{joAssessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_ASSESS_CONTENT = #{joAssessContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_ASSESS_TIME = #{joAssessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.sql:
select distinct (jo.id) as id, jo.ag_id, jo.ag_name, jo.bus_num, jo.platform_name, top.jo_key_name as jo_top_key_num, one.jo_key_name as jo_first_key_num, two.jo_key_name as jo_second_key_num, jo.priority_level, jo.launch_time, jo.launch_person_name, jo.launch_branch_name, jo.launch_person_email, jo.jo_progress, jo.accept_group, jo.deal_time_start, jo.accept_now_group from jo_order jo left join jo_key_manage one on one.jo_key = jo.jo_first_key_num left join jo_key_manage top on top.jo_key = one.jo_key_back_num left join jo_key_manage two on two.jo_key = jo.jo_second_key_num
1 = 1 and jo.id = #{id} and jo.jo_second_key_num like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{joSecondKeyNum}),'%') and jo.ag_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{agName}),'%') and jo.bus_num like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{busNum}),'%') and jo.priority_level = #{priorityLevel} and jo.jo_progress = #{joProgress} and jo.launch_branch_name = #{launchBranchName} and jo.launch_time between #{launchBeginTime} and #{launchEndTime} and ta.jo_task_accept_time between #{taskBeginTime} and #{taskEndTime}) and jo.ag_id = #{agId} and exists(select jt.id from jo_task jt where jt.jo_id = jo.id and jt.deal_group_id = #{joDealGroupId}) and exists(select jt.id from jo_task jt where jt.jo_id = jo.id and jt.second_deal_group like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{secondDealGroup}),'%'))
order by jo.launch_time desc
mapper.select:
select distinct (JO.ID) AS ID,
from JO_ORDER jo left join jo_task jt on jt.jo_id = jo.id where jt.id = #{taskId}
mapper.sql: jo.AG_ID, jo.AG_NAME, jo.BUS_ID, jo.BUS_NUM, jo.PALTFORM_NUM, jo.PLATFORM_NAME, jo.JO_FIRST_KEY_NUM, jo.JO_SECOND_KEY_NUM, jo.PRIORITY_LEVEL, jo.LAUNCH_TIME, jo.LAUNCH_PERSON_ID, jo.LAUNCH_PERSON_NAME, jo.LAUNCH_PERSON_EMAIL, jo.LAUNCH_BRANCH_ID, jo.LAUNCH_BRANCH_NAME, jo.ACCEPT_GROUP_CODE, jo.ACCEPT_GROUP, jo.ACCEPT_NOW_GROUP, jo.DEAL_TIME_START, jo.DEAL_TIME_END, jo.DEAL_TIME_LENGTH, jo.JO_PROGRESS, jo.JO_TITLE, jo.JO_CONTENT, jo.JO_ASSESS_LEVEL, jo.JO_ASSESSOR_NAME, jo.JO_ASSESSOR_TYPE, jo.JO_ASSESSOR_ID, jo.JO_ASSESS_CONTENT, jo.JO_ASSESS_TIME, jo.VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS agId, a.ag_uniq_num AS agUId, a.ag_name AS agName, a.ag_doc_pro AS agProCode, c.name AS agProName FROM a_agent a LEFT JOIN c_organization c ON c.id = a.ag_doc_pro WHERE a.id = #{agId}
